title: Periods
description: Contract conditions governing the general responsibilities related to EO regarding timing

observations.notes: Maximum days from the signing of the contract to Buyer's announcement of the availability on delivery of the Goods and/or the provision of the Services
Maximum days to respond to claims on quality of delivered goods and/or services
Maximum days to additional delivery related to quality claims
Period after which it is considered a refuse of execute the contrac
Maximum days from the signing and registration of the contract when the works will start
Works execution duration from date signed
